plot: Tom works the night shift in the immunology department of a hospital. He finds himself a radio for company, but the 24-hours-per-day news reader slowly invades his thoughts.
title: Radio
plot_es: Tom works the night shift in the immunology department of a hospital. He finds himself a radio for company, but the 24-hours-per-day news reader slowly invades his thoughts.
